title: John Pettibone from Undertow, Himsa, Heiress
itunes:title: John Pettibone from Undertow, Himsa, Heiress
description:
Episode 213 - A legend of Northwest Hardcore, John Pettibone is on the show today. He’s the vocalist for such bands as Undertow, Himsa, The Vows and most recently, Heiress. He invited me over to his house one morning in Seattle and we discussed why he still cares about hardcore, dedication and nostalgia. His son makes a special guest appearance and it was a very fun chat. Try two meals FREE with Blue Apron. It’s simply a better way to cook.SeatGeek is the best place to buy tickets online. Download the app and use the code WORDS for a $20 rebate off of your first purchase.Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
